an3.132:1.3: Pasanalekhupamo puggalo, pathavilekhupamo puggalo, udakalekhupamo puggalo.
an3.132:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhinham kujjhati.
an3.132:1.6: So ca khvassa kodho digharattam anuseti.
an3.132:1.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, pasane lekha na khippam lujjati vatena va udakena va, ciratthitika hoti;
an3.132:1.8: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhinham kujjhati.
an3.132:1.9: So ca khvassa kodho digharattam anuseti.
an3.132:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhinham kujjhati.
an3.132:2.3: So ca khvassa kodho na digharattam anuseti.
an3.132:2.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, pathaviya lekha khippam lujjati vatena va udakena va, na ciratthitika hoti;
an3.132:2.5: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhinham kujjhati.
an3.132:2.6: So ca khvassa kodho na digharattam anuseti.
an3.132:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo agalhenapi vuccamano pharusenapi vuccamano amanapenapi vuccamano sandhiyatimeva samsandatimeva sammodatimeva.
an3.132:3.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, udake lekha khippamyeva pativigacchati, na ciratthitika hoti;
an3.132:3.4: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo agalhenapi vuccamano pharusenapi vuccamano amanapenapi vuccamano sandhiyatimeva samsandatimeva sammodatimeva.
an3.132:3.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
